content:
Craft an item of type: slime_ball
inventory=[{"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "blaze_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 27}, {"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 47, "index": 30}, {"type": "guardian_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 31}, {"type": "pink_stained_glass", "quantity": 41, "index": 38}, {"type": "slime_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "bucket", "quantity": 6, "index": 43}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 44, "index": 45}]
thought: I have 1 slime block in my inventory at slot 40. To craft the slime ball, I need to place the slime block in the crafting grid. Since slot 1 is empty, I will place the slime block there.
act: move from slot 40 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: slime_ball
inventory=[{"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "slime_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "blaze_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 27}, {"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 47, "index": 30}, {"type": "guardian_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 31}, {"type": "pink_stained_glass", "quantity": 41, "index": 38}, {"type": "bucket", "quantity": 6, "index": 43}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 44, "index": 45}]

thought: After placing the slime block in the crafting grid, I can craft 9 slime balls. These slime balls are placed in the crafting output slot (slot 0), so I need to move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 9
